issue.title: [C++] Create a signal-safe self-pipe abstraction
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16799](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16799). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
A signal-safe self-pipe is already used in the Flight server in order to shutdown the server on an incoming SIGINT.

We should refactor this to expose a reusable abstraction.
